Package de.gnwi.jdpdsp.samples.integrationType

Class PnhlnTimeStepCalculator

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.jdpdsp.samples.integrationType.PnhlnTimeStepCalculator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITimeStepCalculator
public class PnhlnTimeStepCalculator extends Object implements ITimeStepCalculator
Nonsymmetric pairwise Nose–Hoover–Langevin thermostat (PNHLN) time step calculator Literature: B. Leimkuhler, X. Shang, On the numerical treatment of dissipative particle dynamics and related systems, Journal of Computational Physics 280, 2015, 72–95

    • PnhlnTimeStepCalculator

      public PnhlnTimeStepCalculator(Factory aFactory, float aMu, boolean anIsCacheUsage, IOutput aSimulationOutput, ILogger aSimulationLogger, Parameters aParameters, de.gnwi.jdpd.parameters.ParallelizationInfo aParallelizationInfo, AtomicInteger aRandomNumberSeed, ParticlePositionPool aParticlePositionPool, int aMaximumNumberOfPositionCorrectionTrials) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      aFactory - Factory for new objects
      aMu - Mu parameter for nonsymmetric pairwise Nose–Hoover–Langevin thermostat (PNHLN) integration
      anIsCacheUsage - Flag for cache usage, True: Cache will be used, false: Otherwise
      aSimulationOutput - Simulation output
      aSimulationLogger - Simulation logger
      aParameters - Parameters instance
      aParallelizationInfo - Parallelisation info
      aRandomNumberSeed - Random number seed
      aParticlePositionPool - Particle position pool (NOT allowed to be null)
      aMaximumNumberOfPositionCorrectionTrials - Maximum number of position correction trials
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if argument is invalid
